recipe.title: Cucumber-Lime Agua
ingredients: 1 pound Persian or English hothouse cucumbers, peeled, cut into 1-inch pieces
10 large mint leaves plus sprigs for garnish
instructions: Additional ice cubes (for serving) Puree cucumbers, ice, grapes, water, and lime juice along with 10 mint leaves in blender. Strain. DO AHEAD: Can be made 6 hours ahead. Cover and chill.
Fill 6 glasses with more ice; pour agua over. Garnish with additional mint sprigs.
